가젯 삭제 메시지:
If you click 'Delete', this gadget will be removed from all users' screen.
Are you sure to delete it?
가젯 로드 오류 메시지:
It fails to bring that you've requested.
If this error keeps occurring, please ask you administrator for help.
가젯 설정저장 오류 메시지: An error has occurred while saving settings.
가젯 삭제 오류 메시지: An error has occurred while deleting the gadget.
가젯 이동 오류 메시지: An error has occurred while moving the gadget.
가젯 없음 메시지:
No gadgets found.
Please ask your administrator.
대시보드 최대갯수 초과메시지: Dashboard can be added up to 5.
대시보드 전환 확인 메시지: If you change a dashboard on a edit mode, unsaved settings will be discarded. Would you like to change?
대시보드 삭제 확인 메시지: All gadget information will be deleted.
가젯 추가 허용 설명:
Everyone can add a gadget to Company Dashboard
Even though he/she is not an admin.
레이아웃 변경 확인 메시지:
Some gadgets might disappear if layout is changed.
Would you like to change?
대시보드 미저장 가젯 안내: There is a gadget which was not saved.
대시보드 미저장 가젯 확인 메시지: If you do not save a newly added gadget, the data might be discarded. Are you sure to finish editing it?
가젯 이동 중 메시지:
The gadget is being moved.
On some browsers scroll cannot be supported.
- Please check what you've entered is correct.
- Try to reduce the number of words or try another word.
- 두단어 이상인 경우, 띄어쓰기를 확인해 보세요: - If you entered two or more words, please check space between the words.
msg-can't-put-script-tags: You can not put a script tag in the editor.
